1 //Namespace
  2 var EarthServerGenericClient = EarthServerGenericClient || {};
  3 
  4 /**
  5  * @class Scene Model: WCPS Image with DEM in Alpha Channel
  6  * 1 URL for the service, 2 Coverage names for the image and dem.
  7  * @augments EarthServerGenericClient.AbstractSceneModel
  8  */
  9 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha = function()
 10 {
 11     this.setDefaults();
 12     this.name = "WCPS Image with DEM in alpha channel.";
 13     /**
 14      * Determines if progressive or complete loading of the model is used.
 15      * @default false
 16      * @type {Boolean}
 17      */
 18     this.progressiveLoading = false;
 19 
 20     /**
 21      * The custom or default WCPS Queries. The array contains either one element for complete loading
 22      * or multiple (3) queries for progressive loading of the model.
 23      * @type {Array}
 24      */
 25     this.WCPSQuery  = [];
 26 };
 27 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.inheritsFrom( EarthServerGenericClient.AbstractSceneModel );
 28 /**
 29  * Enables/Disables the progressive loading of the model.
 30  * @param value - True or False
 31  */
 32 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.setProgressiveLoading=function(value){
 33     this.progressiveLoading = value;
 34 
 35     //Progressive Loading creates 3 requests while normal loading 1
 36     if( this.progressiveLoading){ this.requests = 3; }
 37     else{   this.requests = 1;  }
 38 };
 39 /**
 40  * Sets the URL for the service.
 41  * @param url
 42  */
 43 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.setURL=function(url){
 44     /**
 45      * URL for the WCPS service.
 46      * @type {String}
 47      */
 48     this.URLWCPS = String(url);
 49 };
 50 /**
 51  * Sets both coverage names.
 52  * @param coverageImage - Coverage name for the image data set.
 53  * @param coverageDem   - Coverage name for the dem data set.
 54  */
 55 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.setCoverages = function (coverageImage, coverageDem) {
 56     /**
 57      * Name of the image coverage.
 58      * @type {String}
 59      */
 60     this.coverageImage = String(coverageImage);
 61     /**
 62      * name of the dem coverage.
 63      * @type {String}
 64      */
 65     this.coverageDEM = String(coverageDem);
 66 };
 67 /**
 68  * Sets a specific querystring for the RED channel of the WCPS query.
 69  * All red,blue,green and alpha has to be set, otherwise the standard query will be used.
 70  * @param querystring - the querystring. Use $CI (coverageImage), $CD (coverageDEM),
 71  * $MINX,$MINY,$MAXX,$MAXY(AoI) and $RESX,ResZ (Resolution) for automatic replacement.
 72  * Examples: $CI.red , x($MINX:$MINY)
 73  */
 74 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.setWCPSForChannelRED = function(querystring)
 75 {
 76     this.WCPSQuery[0] = querystring;
 77 };
 78 /**
 79  * Sets a specific querystring for the GREEN channel of the WCPS query.
 80  * All red,blue,green and alpha has to be set, otherwise the standard query will be used.
 81  * @param querystring - the querystring. Use $CI (coverageImage), $CD (coverageDEM),
 82  * $MINX,$MINY,$MAXX,$MAXY(AoI) and $RESX,ResZ (Resolution) for automatic replacement.
 83  * Examples: $CI.red , x($MINX:$MINY)
 84  */
 85 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.setWCPSForChannelGREEN = function(querystring)
 86 {
 87     this.WCPSQuery[1] = querystring;
 88 };
 89 /**
 90  * Sets a specific querystring for the BLUE channel of the WCPS query.
 91  * All red,blue,green and alpha has to be set, otherwise the standard query will be used.
 92  * @param querystring - the querystring. Use $CI (coverageImage), $CD (coverageDEM),
 93  * $MINX,$MINY,$MAXX,$MAXY(AoI) and $RESX,ResZ (Resolution) for automatic replacement.
 94  * Examples: $CI.red , x($MINX:$MINY)
 95  */
 96 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.setWCPSForChannelBLUE = function(querystring)
 97 {
 98     this.WCPSQuery[2] = querystring;
 99 };
100 /**
101  * Sets a specific querystring for the ALPHA channel of the WCPS query.
102  * All red,blue,green and alpha has to be set, otherwise the standard query will be used.
103  * @param querystring - the querystring. Use $CI (coverageImage), $CD (coverageDEM),
104  * $MINX,$MINY,$MAXX,$MAXY(AoI) and $RESX,ResZ (Resolution) for automatic replacement.
105  * Examples: $CI.red , x($MINX:$MINY)
106  */
107 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.setWCPSForChannelALPHA = function(querystring)
108 {
109     this.WCPSQuery[3] = querystring;
110 };
111 
112 /**
113  * Creates the x3d geometry and appends it to the given root node. This is done automatically by the SceneManager.
114  * @param root - X3D node to append the model.
115  * @param index - Index of this model in the SceneManager list.
116  * @param cubeSizeX - Size of the fishtank/cube on the x-axis.
117  * @param cubeSizeY - Size of the fishtank/cube on the y-axis.
118  * @param cubeSizeZ - Size of the fishtank/cube on the z-axis.
119  */
120 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.createModel=function(root, index, cubeSizeX, cubeSizeY, cubeSizeZ){
121     if( root === undefined)
122         alert("root is not defined");
123 
124     EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogStart("Create Model " + this.name);
125 
126     this.cubeSizeX = cubeSizeX;
127     this.cubeSizeY = cubeSizeY;
128     this.cubeSizeZ = cubeSizeZ;
129 
130     this.root = root;
131     this.index = index;
132 
133     //Create Placeholder
134     this.createPlaceHolder();
135 
136     //1: Check if mandatory values are set
137     if( this.coverageImage === undefined || this.coverageDEM === undefined || this.URLWCPS === undefined
138         || this.minx === undefined || this.miny === undefined || this.maxx === undefined || this.maxy === undefined )
139     {
140         alert("Not all mandatory values are set. WCPSDemAlpha: " + this.name );
141         alert(this.coverageImage + this.coverageDEM + this.URLWCPS + this.minx + this.miny+ this.maxx + this.maxy );
142         console.log(this);
143         return;
144     }
145 
146     //2: create wcps query/queries
147     //Either the user query if all query strings are set. Or standard wcps query if wcps channels are not set.
148     //Build one query for complete loading and multiple queries for progressive loading
149 
150     //IF something is not defined use standard query.
151     if( this.WCPSQuery[0] === undefined || this.WCPSQuery[1] === undefined || this.WCPSQuery[2] === undefined || this.WCPSQuery[3] === undefined)
152     {
153         for(var i=0; i<this.requests; i++)
154         {
155             var currentXRes = parseInt(this.XResolution / Math.pow(2,i) );
156             var currentZRes = parseInt(this.ZResolution / Math.pow(2,i) );
157             this.WCPSQuery[i] =  "for i in (" + this.coverageImage + "), dtm in (" + this.coverageDEM + ") return encode ( { ";
158             this.WCPSQuery[i] += "red: scale(trim(i.red, {x(" + this.minx + ":" +  this.maxx + "), y(" + this.miny + ":" + this.maxy + ') }), {x:"CRS:1"(0:' + currentXRes + '), y:"CRS:1"(0:' + currentZRes + ")}, {}); ";
159             this.WCPSQuery[i] += "green: scale(trim(i.green, {x(" + this.minx + ":" +  this.maxx + "), y(" + this.miny + ":" + this.maxy + ') }), {x:"CRS:1"(0:' + currentXRes + '), y:"CRS:1"(0:' + currentZRes + ")}, {}); ";
160             this.WCPSQuery[i] += "blue: scale(trim(i.blue, {x(" + this.minx + ":" +  this.maxx + "), y(" + this.miny + ":" + this.maxy + ') }), {x:"CRS:1"(0:' + currentXRes + '), y:"CRS:1"(0:' + currentZRes + ")}, {});";
161             this.WCPSQuery[i] += "alpha: (char) (((scale(trim(dtm , {x(" + this.minx + ":" +  this.maxx + "), y(" + this.miny + ":" + this.maxy + ') }), {x:"CRS:1"(0:' + currentXRes + '), y:"CRS:1"(0:' + currentZRes + ")}, {})) / 1349) * 255)";
162             this.WCPSQuery[i] += '}, "' + this.imageFormat +'" )';
163         }
164     }
165     else //ALL set so use custom query
166     {
167         //Create multiple queries if progressive loading is set or one if not.
168         for(var j=0; j<this.requests; j++)
169         {
170             //Replace $ symbols with the actual values
171             var tmpString = [];
172             for(i=0; i<4; i++)
173             {
174                 tmpString[i] = this.WCPSQuery[i].replace("$CI","image");
175                 tmpString[i] = tmpString[i].replace("$CD","dtm");
176                 tmpString[i] = tmpString[i].replace("$MINX",this.minx);
177                 tmpString[i] = tmpString[i].replace("$MINY",this.miny);
178                 tmpString[i] = tmpString[i].replace("$MAXX",this.maxx);
179                 tmpString[i] = tmpString[i].replace("$MAXY",this.maxy);
180                 tmpString[i] = tmpString[i].replace("$RESX",parseInt(this.XResolution / Math.pow(2,j) ) );
181                 tmpString[i] = tmpString[i].replace("$RESZ",parseInt(this.ZResolution / Math.pow(2,j) ) );
182             }
183             this.WCPSQuery[j] =  "for image in (" + this.coverageImage + "), dtm in (" + this.coverageDEM + ") return encode ( { ";
184             this.WCPSQuery[j] += "red: " + tmpString[0] + " ";
185             this.WCPSQuery[j] += "green: " + tmpString[1]+ " ";
186             this.WCPSQuery[j] += "blue: " + tmpString[2] + " ";
187             this.WCPSQuery[j] += "alpha: " + tmpString[3];
188             this.WCPSQuery[j] += '}, "' + this.imageFormat +'" )';
189         }
190     }
191 
192     //3: Make ServerRequest and receive data.
193     if( !this.progressiveLoading)
194     {   EarthServerGenericClient.requestWCPSImageAlphaDem(this,this.URLWCPS,this.WCPSQuery[0]);  }
195     else
196     {   EarthServerGenericClient.progressiveWCPSImageLoader(this,this.URLWCPS,this.WCPSQuery,true);   }
197 };
198 /**
199  * This is a callback method as soon as the ServerRequest in createModel() has received it's data.
200  * This is done automatically.
201  * @param data - Received data from the ServerRequest.
202  */
203 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.receiveData = function( data)
204 {
205     if( this.checkReceivedData(data))
206     {
207         //If progressive loading is enabled this function is called multiple times.
208         //The lower resolution version shall be removed and replaced with the new one.
209         //So the old transformNode will be removed and a new one created.
210         if(this.transformNode !== undefined )
211         {   this.root.removeChild(this.transformNode); }
212 
213         //In the first receiveData call remove the placeholder.
214         this.removePlaceHolder();
215 
216         var YResolution = (parseFloat(data.maxHMvalue) - parseFloat(data.minHMvalue) );
217         this.transformNode = this.createTransform(data.width,YResolution,data.height,parseFloat(data.minHMvalue));
218         this.root.appendChild(this.transformNode);
219 
220         //Set transparency
221         data.transparency =  this.transparency;
222 
223         //Create Terrain out of the received data
224         if( !this.progressiveLoading)
225         {
226             EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogStart("Create Terrain " + this.name);
227             this.terrain = new EarthServerGenericClient.LODTerrain(this.transformNode, data, this.index);
228             this.terrain.createTerrain();
229             EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("Create Terrain " + this.name);
230             EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("Create Model " + this.name);
231         }
232         else
233         {
234             //Check if terrain is already created. Create it in the first function call.
235             if( this.terrain === undefined )
236             {   this.terrain = new EarthServerGenericClient.ProgressiveTerrain(this.index); }
237 
238             //Add new data (with higher resolution) to the terrain
239             EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogStart("Create Terrain " + this.name);
240             this.terrain.insertLevel(this.transformNode,data);
241             EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("Create Terrain " + this.name);
242 
243             if( this.receivedDataCount === this.requests)
244             {   EarthServerGenericClient_MainScene.timeLogEnd("Create Model " + this.name);   }
245         }
246 
247         //Delete transformNode when the last response call is done.
248         //Until that the pointer is needed to delete the old terrain just before the new terrain is build.
249         if( this.receivedDataCount === this.requests )
250         {   this.transformNode = null;  }
251     }
252 };
253 
254 /**
255  * Every Scene Model creates it's own specific UI elements. This function is called automatically by the SceneManager.
256  * @param element - The element where to append the specific UI elements for this model.
257  * @param modelNumber - Number of this model in the SceneManager.
258  */
259 EarthServerGenericClient.Model_WCPSDemAlpha.prototype.setSpecificElement= function(element,modelNumber)
260 {
261     EarthServerGenericClient.appendElevationSlider(element,modelNumber);
262 };
